backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-coin wallet backend with authorization, user profiles, transaction history, contacts management, and balance tracking for ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, and Infinity Coin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence bugs: incorrect ckBTC minter method name in useCkBtcDepositAddress hook and decoding error in useCkBtcDepositStatus hook.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including React components, hooks, pages, utilities, and styling for the Infinity Wallet application with Internet Identity authentication and multi-token support.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Infinity Wallet application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Smoke test checklist covering connection flow, profile setup, dashboard rendering, navigation, send/receive operations, contacts CRUD, and address validation for post-deployment validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing Internet Identity authentication flow, profile setup dialog, page routing, loading states, and error handling with theme provider and toast notifications.
Authentication button component for Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out with loading states, error handling for duplicate authentication, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the user's Internet Identity principal with optional truncation and copy-to-clipboard functionality. Shows a styled card with the principal text and a copy button that provides visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name. Cannot be dismissed and saves the profile using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/contacts/Contact: Dialog component for creating or editing contacts with name and address fields. Validates recipient addresses and uses useSaveContact/useUpdateContact hooks for persistence.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with a reload button. Shows error details in an expandable section for debugging.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation bar, and content area. Provides navigation between dashboard, send, receive, contacts, history, and contracts pages with futuristic styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLog: Renders the application logo with gradient text and glow effects. Displays the app name from branding configuration alongside the logo image.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceCa: Card component displaying token balance with icon, loading states, error handling, and refresh functionality. Formats balance and shows skeleton loader during data fetching.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinDe: Alert component that displays pending Bitcoin deposit status using useCkBtcDepositStatus hook. Shows processing information and refresh button when deposits are pending.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BitcoinFe: Informational alert displaying Bitcoin network fees in satoshis and BTC, along with processing time estimates. Shows loading state while fee calculation is in progress.
frontend/src/components/wallet/Recipient: Popover component with searchable contact list for selecting transaction recipients. Displays contact names and truncated addresses, calling onSelect callback when a contact is chosen.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TotalAsse: Displays total wallet assets with denomination selector for multiple tokens (InfinityCoin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL), showing the selected token's balance without cross-token conversion.
frontend/src/components/wallet/TransferM: Radio group component for selecting between wrapped token transfers (fast ICRC-1) and native Bitcoin withdrawals (slower with network fees).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcBalance.ts: Fetches ckBTC balance from ICRC-1 ledger using the user's principal and default account, with comprehensive debug logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositAddres: Retrieves the user's Bitcoin deposit address from the ckBTC minter canister, with mainnet-only error handling for local development.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcDepositStatus: Checks for pending Bitcoin deposits by calling the minter's update_balance method, with graceful handling for local development environments.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcLedger.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger client, initializing it when identity is available with detailed debug logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinter.ts: Creates and manages the ckBTC minter client instance, initializing it when user identity is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcMinterInfo.ts: Fetches static minter configuration information with 5-minute cache, enabled only when minter client is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdraw.ts: Mutation hook for withdrawing ckBTC to native Bitcoin addresses, invalidating balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkBtcWithdrawalSta: Polls withdrawal status by block index every 10 seconds until confirmed, stopping when transaction is finalized.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthBalance.ts: React hook that fetches ckETH balance using TanStack Query, calling the ICRC-1 ledger's icrc1_balance_of method with comprehensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkEthLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckETH ledger client, creating it when identity is available and verifying actor methods with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolBalance.ts: React hook that fetches ckSOL balance using TanStack Query, calling the ICRC-1 ledger's icrc1_balance_of method with comprehensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useCkSolLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ckSOL ledger client, creating it when identity is available and verifying actor methods with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpBalance.ts: React hook that fetches ICP balance using TanStack Query, calling the ICRC-1 ledger's icrc1_balance_of method with comprehensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated ICP ledger client, creating it when identity is available and verifying actor methods with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityCoinBalanc: React hook that fetches Infinity Coin balance using TanStack Query, calling the ICRC-1 ledger's icrc1_balance_of method with comprehensive console logging for debugging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinityLedger.ts: React hook that initializes and manages an authenticated Infinity Coin ledger client, creating it when identity is available and verifying actor methods with detailed logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, transaction history, and contacts management with mutations that invalidate caches and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark cosmic theme, neon glow utilities (cyan, purple, magenta), and animated starfield background.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports branding constants including app name 'Infinity Wallet' and supported token symbols (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, Infinity Coin).
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/client.ts: ICRC-1 ckBTC ledger client implementation with TypeScript types, IDL factory, and authenticated actor creation with comprehensive debugging for balance queries and transfers.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckBTC ICRC-1 ledger canister ID constant 'mxzaz-hqaaa-aaaar-qaada-cai'.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckBTC ledger configuration, client functions, and TypeScript types for ICRC-1 account and transfer operations.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/client.ts: ckBTC minter client with TypeScript types and IDL factory for Bitcoin address generation, balance updates, BTC retrieval, and status queries.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/config.ts: Exports the ckBTC minter canister ID constant 'mqygn-kiaaa-aaaar-qaadq-cai' for mainnet.
frontend/src/lib/ckBtcMinter/index.ts: Re-exports all ckBTC minter configuration and client functionality.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/client.ts: Creates an authenticated ICRC-1 ckETH ledger client with comprehensive debugging, including types for accounts, transfers, and errors, plus an IDL factory for canister communication.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckETH ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckEthLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckETH ledger configuration, client creation function, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/client.ts: Creates an authenticated ICRC-1 ckSOL ledger client with comprehensive debugging, including types for accounts, transfers, and errors, plus an IDL factory for canister communication.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/config.ts: Exports the ckSOL ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/ckSolLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ckSOL ledger configuration, client creation function, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/icpAccountId.ts: Derives ICP Ledger Account Identifiers from Principals using SHA-224 hashing and CRC32 checksums with default subaccounts.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/client.ts: Creates an authenticated ICRC-1 ICP ledger client with comprehensive debugging, including types for accounts, transfers, and errors, plus an IDL factory for canister communication.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/config.ts: Exports the ICP ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/icpLedger/index.ts: Re-exports ICP ledger configuration, client creation function, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/client.t: Creates an authenticated ICRC-1 Infinity Coin ledger client with comprehensive debugging, including types for accounts, transfers, and errors, plus an IDL factory for canister communication.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/config.t: Exports the Infinity Coin ledger canister ID constant as the single source of truth.
frontend/src/lib/infinityLedger/index.ts: Re-exports Infinity Coin ledger configuration, client creation function, and all ICRC-1 types for external use.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for CSS class merging, principal truncation, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation functions for cryptocurrency addresses (ICP Principal/Account ID, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana) and amounts, plus utilities for parsing amounts to e8s format and formatting balances.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays and manages a user's saved contacts with add, edit, and delete functionality using custom hooks and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for calling canister methods with Internet Identity authentication, currently simulating contract calls as a demo implementation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying total assets and individual token balances (InfinityCoin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) with Bitcoin deposit status and navigation props.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays transaction history with token filtering, showing locally recorded submissions with a disclaimer that actual balances are controlled by ICRC-1 ledgers.
frontend/src/pages/ReceivePage.tsx: React page component that displays user's Principal address for receiving ICRC-1 tokens (ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL, Infinity Coin) and a native Bitcoin deposit address for receiving ckBTC, with copy-to-clipboard functionality and error handling for mainnet-only features.
frontend/src/pages/SendPage.tsx: React page component for sending tokens with multi-step form (form/confirm/success), supporting multiple token types (Infinity Coin, ICP, ckBTC, ckETH, ckSOL) and transfer modes (wrapped/native), including validation, balance checks, and transaction recording.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended utilities for glow/neon effects, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), and container/responsive settings.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting known issues with ckBTC minter integration (missing 'get_btc_address' method, deposit status decoding error, agent configuration conflict) and tracking feature requests to resolve these issues.
